Name: SQL - Execute SQL Script with SQL or Windows Authentication
Description: Executes SQL script file(s) against the specified database using either SQL or Windows authentication. SQL Scripts can be hardcoded value or can be from an extracted NuGet package.
Author: RichiePhoebix

Parameters.Name: Username
Parameters.Label: Username
Parameters.HelpText: The username to use to connect (only applies with SqlAuthentication selected)

Parameters.Name: Password
Parameters.Label: Password
Parameters.HelpText: The password to use to connect (only applies with SqlAuthentication selected)

Parameters.Name: SQLScripts
Parameters.Label: SQL Scripts
Parameters.HelpText:
Full path to each script name on a new line
Wildcards are accepted, eg. C:\Scripts\*.sql, C:\Scripts\Deploy*.sql

Parameters.Name: DacpacPackageExtractStepName
Parameters.Label: DACPAC Package Extract Step Name
Parameters.HelpText: Optional: The step in which the DACPAC package was installed. Can be left as blank if SQLScripts is a hardcoded value.
